      • authenticate

        @Path(value="/login")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response authenticate(java.lang.String encryptedLoginCredentials)
        Endpoint used to receive client data to authenticate a client
        Parameters:
        encryptedLoginCredentials - The login credentials of the client received as json and encrypted
        Returns:
        The authenticated client as json

      • getCourses

        @Path(value="course/user/{userId}")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getCourses(int clientId)
        Endpoint used to retrieve courses of a specific client.
        Parameters:
        clientId - The client's ID
        Returns:
        An ArrayList with the client's courses as json

public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getLectureStatistics(int courseId,
                                                                                                          int lectureId)
        Endpoint used to retrieve statistics for a specific lecture
        Parameters:
        lectureId - The ID of the lecture
        courseId - The ID of that lecture's course
        Returns:
        Returns a Map with the lecture's statistics as json.

      • softDeleteReview

        @Path(value="review/delete")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response softDeleteReview(java.lang.String encryptedReview)
        Endpoint used to soft-delete reviews of a specific lecture
        Parameters:
        encryptedReview - The review to be soft-deleted received as JSON and encrypted
        Returns:
        Returns a http response 200 and confirms that it is deleted

public javax.ws.rs.core.Response addReview(java.lang.String encryptedReview)
        Endpoint used to add reviews of a specific lecture to the database
        Parameters:
        encryptedReview - The review to be added received as JSON and encrypted
        Returns:
        Returns a http response 200 and confirms that it is added
